xtrememp.visualization

Class AbstractVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtrememp.visualization.AbstractVisualization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AbstractVisualization>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractOscilloscope, AbstractSpectrumAnalyzer, Stereograph, StereoWaveform, VolumeMeter, WaterBalloons, Waveform

    public abstract class AbstractVisualization
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AbstractVisualization>
    Visualization base class.

      • averageChannels

        public float[] averageChannels(float[][] audioChannels)
        This method is used by visualizations processing a single channel of audio data. It averages the left and right values from each channel to provide the output. Returns a float array as the result of merging the audioChannels arrays.
        Parameters:
        audioChannels - An array of floats containing the input audio data.
        Returns:
        A float array object.
